transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. 

Executive: Karamveer ji namaskar.

Customer: Ji sir, keh rahe hain Karamveer ji aap?

Executive: IndiaMART se main customer baat kar raha hun Karamveer ji.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai aapko?

Customer: Boliye.

Executive: Karamveer ji buylead buylead consume kar rahe hain aap jaise ki pichle aap se maine manager sir ki baat karwai thi, manager sir ne aapko bataya tha buylead consume kariye jo hai filhal hamare paas. Aap jo bol rahe the ki abhi mere paas kuch bhi products nahi hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Achha achha to kya chal raha hai matlab filhal kuch mil raha hai, kar rahe hain ya nahi?

Customer: Hum call to karte hain ji mera to koi problem to solve kar hi nahi rahe hain.

Executive: Achha problem matlab solution kya chahiye sir aapko ye bataiye mujhe ek baar.

Customer: Mera refund kar dijiye paisa.

Executive: Achha paisa refund karwana hai aapko?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aapki jo aapko jo IndiaMART pe aap aaye the platform pe to aap isliye aaye the ki jo aapko laya tha IndiaMART ke platform pe usne ye bola tha aapko ki IndiaMART aapko salary provide karwayega buylead provide karwayega?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Achha aur aapko jo hai aapke paas koi product nahi hai bechne ke liye IndiaMART pe to is wajah se aapko apna refund chahiye?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Jo hisab se commitment kiya gaya tha us hisab se matlab aapke sath nahi hua hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: To aapko refund chahiye is time pe ya aage chal ke koi plan banega ki products aayenge koi bechne ke liye?

Customer: Kya bole?

Executive: Aage chal ke koi plan banega ki products aayenge ya services provide karwani hai?

Customer: Hoga to hum sab karenge.

Executive: 100% refund chahiye aapko?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Achha achha ek minute main aapki baat suna deta hun sir se ek baar abhi aapko aapka aaj ke aaj mein sara ho jayega abhi khatam.

Customer: Kya hoga?

Executive: Problem sir aaj ke aaj problem solve ho jayega aapka sara.

Customer: Bilkul kijiye.

Executive: Ji ji abhi aap call pe rahiye aap.

Customer: Theek hai. Call pe rahiye aap.

(silence)

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan boliye.

Executive: Ji Karamveer ji, Karamveer ji main aapse ye jaanna chah raha tha.

Customer: Hmm boliye.

Executive: Ji matlab ki jaise basically meri aapse teen char baar bhi pehle baat ho chuki hai is cheez ke bare mein.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ki aapko aap phir bhi aap ek baat bol rahe hain ki refund chahiye mujhe. Main aapse ye jaanna chah raha tha ki aage chal ke aisa hoga ki ek mahine baad ya phir pehle bhi aapse jo baat hui thi ki abhi hum products laayenge kuch IndiaMART pe ya matlab koi aisa plan hi nahi aage tak ab koi?

Customer: Abhi kuch nahi hai agar hoga to hum zarur sampark karenge humko. Ichha to hai karne ka.

Executive: Achha achha ji aap try karne ka. Ji services pe IndiaMART ka to aapko naam pata hi hai IndiaMART ke services pe aap agar aaye hain to dekh ke hi aaye honge IndiaMART ki hype ki IndiaMART ka jo sara site hai wo bahut bade level pe hai India ke andar.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Wo to chalo aapke apne end se jo bhi marzi hai main to aapko yahi cheez guide karna chahunga agar aap kar rahe hain agle mahine se koi start kar rahe hain agle mahine se dekh sakte hain to services end mat karwaiye.

Executive: Agar aapko aisa hai ki main kar hi nahi raha hun kar nahi paunga to hum specifically dekh sakte hain bataiye aap aapka decision main aapko sirf guidance de sakta hun Karamveer ji aapka jo decision making ka kaam hai wo aapka hai.

Customer: Theek hai na abhi jo main bol raha hun usko karwaiye na uske baad phir main waisa hoga to zarur call karunga.

Executive: Achha filhal jo hai aapki jo services chali hui hai IndiaMART pe jo aapne services chali thi aapki IndiaMART pe main dekh leta hun September ke time pe services shuru hui thi hamari.

Customer: Kya bole?

Executive: September aur October.

Executive: September ke time hamari services shuru hui thi IndiaMART pe. September aur October do mahine ho gaye IndiaMART pe. Do mahine hone wale hain matlab. Ab aapka final decision ho gaya sir ye?

Customer: Haan final decision hai.

Executive: Achha final decision hai to aapka maine ye jo hai case record kar liya hai update karne ke liye main ab aapka jo mere manager sir hain unko call aayega aapke paas thodi der baad. Wo aapse baat karenge aur aapka case jo hai is cheez ko close kar denge.

Customer: Aaj clear kijiye.

Executive: Aaj aaj clear ho jayega ye aapka.

Customer: Theek hai. Okay okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of subscription amount.

- No business or leads generated.



Resolution:

- Executive assured issue will be resolved today.

- Case recorded and will be updated.

- Manager will call to close the case.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, resolution
